voice.enableVoiceInstructions: To enable text-to-speech for translations, please install a voice for at least one of the supported languages: {{languages}}.
voice.windowsInstructions: Go to Settings > Time & Language > Language & region, and add the desired language pack.
voice.macosInstructions: Go to System Settings > Accessibility > Spoken Content > System Voice, and download the desired voices.
voice.iosInstructions: Go to Settings > Accessibility > Spoken Content > Voices, and download the voices for the desired languages.
voice.androidInstructions: Go to Settings > Accessibility > Text-to-speech output. Tap the gear icon for your preferred engine (e.g., Speech Services by Google), then select Install voice data and choose the desired languages.
voice.afterInstallation: After installation, click 'Retry'. You can also proceed without voice playback.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Stop struggling with robotic translations that miss the point. Get natural, contextually-aware translations powered by advanced AI technology - perfect for important conversations and professional communications.

advancedAI.title: Advanced AI Technology
features: Gemini 2.5 powered - State-of-the-art AI for superior accuracy
Context understanding - Grasps situation and provides appropriate translations
Natural output - Translations that sound human, not machine-generated
Continuous learning - Improves with usage for better results

quickSessions.title: Quick Translation Sessions
features: 3-minute recording limit - Perfect for quick conversations and phrases
Multi-speaker pickup - Captures both sides of conversations
Tourist-focused sessions - Ideal for restaurant orders, directions, shopping
Voice enhancement - Clarifies all voices in the conversation
Real-time processing - Fast translations for immediate communication

languageSupport.title: Comprehensive Language Support
features: 50+ languages - Cover major world languages and dialects
Technical vocabulary - Handles business, medical, and specialized terms
Cultural adaptation - Understands cultural context for appropriate communication
Real-time processing - Fast, responsive translations when you need them

smartFeatures.title: Smart Features
features: Text and voice input - Type or speak, your choice
Photo translation - Translate text in images and signs
Conversation mode - Back-and-forth dialogue support
Offline pronunciation - Access phonetic guides without internet

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
features: No conversation storage - Translations processed but not saved by us
Secure processing - Advanced encryption for all communications
GDPR compliant - Meets international privacy standards

perfectFor.title: Perfect For:
features: Tourist conversations - Restaurant orders, hotel check-ins, shopping assistance
Quick directions - Getting help with navigation and local information
Cultural exchanges - Brief interactions with locals and service staff
Travel emergencies - Fast communication in urgent situations
Language practice - Short practice sessions with native speakers
